ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
You truly make this space feel complete,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2101_01_10: I have something nice for you! Please, take it.
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Items are meant to be used to their fullest,
so don’t be shy!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! A present for
you. Please take it!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2103_02_10: Consider it a gift of gratitude!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
I hope it touches your heart,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I was waiting for a chance to talk with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Wow, thank you! I’ll take good care of this!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’ll be sure to give you something in return,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2402_01_10: I had a great time! Well, I’ll see you later!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2401_01_10: We really got to talk today!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s chat again. Next time, I hope we can share
even more interesting stories!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8001_0701_01_10: I do love this space. My heart feels calm here...
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Once I gather my energy, it’ll be time to step out
into the vast world again.
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
What a grand idea it is to create a virtual space!
Mighty Palkia would be surprised, too!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I thought the idea of creating a new space would
anger mighty Palkia, but we have nothing to worry
about!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Because mighty Palkia has a big heart as endless
as space itself!
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8003_0701_01_10: I feel calm when I play the flute.
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I can feel my heart extend out to the world with
the tones that carry to the very ends of space.
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8003_0701_03_10: It makes me feel at one with the world.
ch0285_00_kai_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
If you ever want to feel calm, just come listen to
me play the flute, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
